findings.title: Carga Simultánea de Múltiples Scripts de Tracking
findings.description: En el <head> se cargan Google Tag Manager, Facebook Pixel y Trekkie (script de Shopify para analítica) simultáneamente.
findings.impact: Incrementa tiempos de carga, uso de cookies no consentidas, afecta el Time to Interactive (TTI) y obliga a los usuarios a aceptar cookies, contradiciendo la política que afirma no usarlas.
findings.recommendation: Revisar la necesidad de cada script; consolidar analíticas; implementar carga asíncrona y consentimiento de cookies antes de cargar scripts de tracking.

findings.title: Puntuaciones de Rendimiento Bajas en PageSpeed
findings.description: Múltiples páginas muestran puntuaciones bajas de rendimiento. Promedio móvil: 62.5/100, desktop: 85.7/100.
findings.impact: Mala experiencia de usuario, mayores tasas de rebote, impacto negativo en rankings SEO.
findings.recommendation: Optimizar imágenes, implementar lazy loading, minificar CSS/JS, habilitar caché, reducir recursos que bloquean el renderizado.

findings.title: Core Web Vitals Deficientes
findings.description: Varias páginas no cumplen con los umbrales de Core Web Vitals (LCP > 4s, CLS > 0.25, TTI > 10s).
findings.impact: Impacto negativo en rankings de búsqueda y experiencia de usuario.
findings.recommendation: Optimizar LCP mejorando tiempo de respuesta del servidor, optimizando imágenes, precargando recursos clave. Corregir CLS estableciendo dimensiones en imágenes/videos, evitando desplazamientos de diseño.

findings.title: Bloqueo de Renderizado por JavaScript
findings.description: Se descubrió la carga de ficheros vendor.min.js, app.min.js y foxkit-app.min.js en la cabecera de forma síncrona.
findings.impact: Dichos scripts bloquean la renderización inicial, aumentando el First Contentful Paint (FCP) y el Time to Interactive (TTI).
findings.recommendation: Cargar scripts de forma asíncrona o diferida, usar defer/async attributes, o mover scripts no críticos al final del body.

findings.title: Fuentes Personalizadas Bloquean Renderizado
findings.description: Se cargan fuentes Jost y Roboto Condensed desde el CDN de Shopify y fonts.gstatic.com sin preloading adecuado.
findings.impact: Sin preloading adecuado, estas solicitudes bloquean el renderizado y aumentan el tiempo de descarga.
findings.recommendation: Limitar a 1–2 familias de fuentes y precargar solo los estilos necesarios usando <link rel='preload'> para fuentes críticas.

findings.title: Legal Compliance Review Needed
findings.description: Review required for privacy policy, terms of service, cookie policy, and health disclaimers.
findings.impact: Legal risk, potential non-compliance with health sector regulations (COFEPRIS in Mexico).
findings.recommendation: Ensure all required legal documents are present, accessible, and compliant with health sector regulations. Add disclaimers to product pages.
evidence: Review all legal pages and product disclaimers

findings.title: Image Optimization Needed
findings.description: Images may not be optimized for web (WebP format, lazy loading, responsive sizes).
findings.impact: Slower page load times, poor mobile experience, higher bandwidth usage.
findings.recommendation: Convert images to WebP, implement lazy loading, use responsive images with srcset.

findings.title: Caching Strategy Review
findings.description: Browser and server caching may not be optimally configured.
findings.impact: Unnecessary server load, slower repeat visits, higher bandwidth costs.
findings.recommendation: Implement proper cache headers (Cache-Control, ETag), enable CDN caching if available.

findings.title: Mobile Responsiveness Testing
findings.description: Comprehensive mobile responsiveness testing across devices needed.
findings.impact: Poor mobile user experience, potential loss of mobile traffic.
findings.recommendation: Test on multiple devices and screen sizes, fix responsive breakpoints, optimize touch targets.

findings.title: Sitemap XML Missing or Incomplete
findings.description: Sitemap XML may not be properly configured or submitted to search engines.
findings.impact: Slower indexing by search engines, missed SEO opportunity.
findings.recommendation: Generate comprehensive sitemap.xml, submit to Google Search Console and Bing Webmaster Tools.

findings.title: Robots.txt Optimization
findings.description: Robots.txt may need optimization for better crawl efficiency.
findings.impact: Inefficient crawling, potential blocking of important pages.
findings.recommendation: Review and optimize robots.txt, ensure sitemap reference is included.

findings.title: 404 Error Pages Not Customized
findings.description: Custom 404 error pages may not be implemented.
findings.impact: Poor user experience when pages are not found, lost conversion opportunities.
findings.recommendation: Create custom 404 page with navigation links and search functionality.

findings.title: Breadcrumb Navigation Missing
findings.description: Breadcrumb navigation may not be implemented on category and product pages.
findings.impact: Poor user navigation, missed SEO opportunity (BreadcrumbList schema).
findings.recommendation: Implement breadcrumb navigation with BreadcrumbList schema markup.

findings.title: Internal Linking Strategy
findings.description: Internal linking strategy may not be optimized for SEO and user navigation.
findings.impact: Reduced SEO value distribution, poor user navigation experience.
findings.recommendation: Implement strategic internal linking with descriptive anchor text, ensure 3+ internal links per page.

findings.title: Alt Text for Images Missing or Incomplete
findings.description: Some images may be missing descriptive alt text.
findings.impact: Poor accessibility, missed SEO opportunity, non-compliance with WCAG guidelines.
findings.recommendation: Add descriptive alt text to all images, especially product images and icons.

findings.title: URL Structure Optimization
findings.description: URL structure may not be optimized for SEO (length, keywords, hierarchy).
findings.impact: Reduced SEO value, poor user experience, harder to remember URLs.
findings.recommendation: Optimize URLs to be short, descriptive, and include relevant keywords. Use hyphens as separators.

findings.title: Page Load Speed Optimization
findings.description: Page load speeds may be suboptimal, affecting user experience and SEO.
findings.impact: Higher bounce rates, negative impact on search rankings, poor mobile experience.
findings.recommendation: Optimize server response time, minimize render-blocking resources, optimize critical rendering path.

findings.title: SSL Certificate and HTTPS Configuration
findings.description: HTTPS configuration and SSL certificate setup may need review.
findings.impact: Security concerns, negative SEO impact, browser warnings.
findings.recommendation: Ensure valid SSL certificate, proper HTTPS redirects, HSTS header implementation.

findings.title: Content Security Policy (CSP) Missing
findings.description: Content Security Policy header may not be implemented.
findings.impact: Increased vulnerability to XSS attacks, security best practice not followed.
findings.recommendation: Implement CSP header to restrict resource loading and prevent XSS attacks.

findings.title: Cookie Consent Banner Missing
findings.description: Cookie consent banner may not be properly implemented for GDPR/compliance.
findings.impact: Legal compliance risk, potential fines, poor user trust.
findings.recommendation: Implement cookie consent banner with proper disclosure and opt-in/opt-out options.

findings.title: Analytics and Tracking Implementation Review
findings.description: Analytics and tracking implementation may need review for accuracy and privacy compliance.
findings.impact: Inaccurate data, privacy compliance issues, missed insights.
findings.recommendation: Review Google Analytics implementation, ensure privacy-compliant tracking, verify data accuracy.

findings.title: Form Validation and Error Handling
findings.description: Form validation and error handling may not be optimal.
findings.impact: Poor user experience, potential security vulnerabilities, lost conversions.
findings.recommendation: Implement client-side and server-side validation, clear error messages, secure form handling.

findings.title: Search Functionality Optimization
findings.description: Site search functionality may not be optimized for user experience.
findings.impact: Poor user experience, lost sales opportunities, increased bounce rate.
findings.recommendation: Implement autocomplete, search suggestions, filters, and ensure search results are relevant.

findings.title: Product Schema Markup for E-commerce
findings.description: Product pages may be missing comprehensive Product schema markup.
findings.impact: Missed opportunity for rich snippets, reduced visibility in search results.
findings.recommendation: Implement Product schema with price, availability, reviews, ratings, and other relevant fields.

findings.title: Local Business Schema for Multiple Locations
findings.description: LocalBusiness schema may not be implemented for physical store locations.
findings.impact: Missed local SEO opportunity, reduced visibility in local search results.
findings.recommendation: Implement LocalBusiness schema for CDMX and Puebla locations with complete NAP (Name, Address, Phone) data.
